evidence.text: the mediation of this case that took place on Monday, October 28, 2024, resulted in a full and final settlement of all claims as to all parties

the proposed settlement in this matter was presented to the City Commission in a closed-door session on November 19, 2024, was approved by City officials, and will now be brought before the City Commission on a public agenda tentatively set for December 3, 2024 for final approval

extracted.value: 2024-11-19: City Commission closed-door session for settlement approval

evidence.text: will now be brought before the City Commission on a public agenda tentatively set for December 3, 2024 for final approval
the parties shall file the appropriate settlement documentation with the Court on or before December 17, 2024
